com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.eclipse.dialogs

Interface AcrolinxOptionsPreferenceView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    OptionContentPresenter.CheckTabView, OptionContentPresenter.ColorFrameView, OptionContentPresenter.LoggingFrameView, OptionContentPresenter.OptionContentView, OptionContentPresenter.PluginTabView, OptionContentPresenter.ServerFrameView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AcrolinxOptionsPreferencePage

    public interface AcrolinxOptionsPreferenceView
extends OptionContentPresenter.OptionContentView
    The interface AcrolinxOptionsPreferenceView is used to display the Acrolinx options in Eclipse preferences. See AcrolinxOptionsPreferencePresenter, AcrolinxOptionsPreferencePage.
